description:
Go farther, climb higher and ski better. The Backland XTD 95 Boots are in their natural habitat on sustained ascents and technical, performance-oriented descents. With an incredible 74 degrees of mobility, skinning and bootpacking isn't a sufferfest. Memory Fit heating technology creates a fully personalized shell, cuff, and liner for ambitious ski days, tours and whatever falls in between.

  • Shell and cuff are made of light and stiff polyamide
  • Prolite construction in the shell and cuff provides support and power
  • Energy backbone reinforcements provides extra power and edge grip. transmission
  • 3D Gold Tour liner with Dry Fit Foam is thermo-mouldable, hand washable and fast drying
  • Free/Lock 4.5 ski/walk mechanism gives you 74° range of motion for climbing and 13-17° of forward lean for skiing
  • 2 aluminum buckles and a 40mm power strap
  • Cross Lace 2.5 closure system wraps and holds your foot securely
  • Medium 100mm last allows the foot to move naturally while touring, yet with secure foot hold
  • Frictionless mirror pivots use polymer bushings to provide natural movement on ascents
  • Rockered rubber sole allows for nearly normal walking
  • Compatible with Atomic Shift, and all MN, MNC and Pin bindings
name: Atomic Backland XTD 110 Ski Boots - Unisex
